noun.description: A bivalve mollusc of the family Unionidae; a unio.

adjective.description: Designating molluscs of the family Unionidae; relating to or characteristic of this family.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Philip Carpenter (1819–1877), social reformer and conchologist. From scientific Latin Unionidae, family name from Unio unio + -idae, with insertion of -n- after classical Latin ūniōn-, ūniō, etymon of the first element.
